name: Earth Invasion!
description: Earth Invason! is a challenging modern take on the classic fixed shooter.  Backgrounds are a mix of pixel art and real photography captured by our team.  Groove to extremely catchy electronic music as you travel across Earth, blasting wave after wave of enemies. They think they can take over our planet? They've just invaded the wrong place!  Acquire ridiculously powerful items to help you through levels! Completely crush the invading enemy force!  Single player. Windows only.
